content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for showing interest in my apartment! I understand that you are looking for a place to stay in Munich, and I'm happy to help you find a suitable rental price. Can you tell me a little bit more about your needs and preferences? For example, do you have any specific requirements for the apartment, such as the number of bedrooms or the location? Additionally, what is your budget for rent? Knowing this information will help me to provide you with a more accurate rental price quote.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student and I want to live in a 25 square meter apartment. I don't have any specific requirements for the apartment or the location, but I want to live in a quiet area. My budget for rent is 400 Euros per month. What do you suggest?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for the information. Based on your requirements, I would suggest a rental price of 450 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. This price takes into account the quiet location of the apartment and the fact that you are a student with a moderate budget. Of course, I am open to negotiating the rental price, so please let me know if you have any counteroffers or if you would like to discuss other aspects of the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 450 Euros per month. Can you please provide me with the rental agreement and the lease length?

Also, I would like to know if there are any additional fees that I need to pay, such as security deposits or moving fees.

Finally, do you have any recommendations for utilities and other expenses that I should budget for?

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman

P.S. I would like to remind you that I am a responsible and dependable tenant, and I will make sure to pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Dear Hassan,

Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 450 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. I am glad to hear that you are a responsible and dependable tenant, and I am confident that you will take good care of the apartment.

To clarify, the rental agreement will be for a minimum of one year, with the option to renew for an additional year. The security deposit for the apartment is 200 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the rental agreement. There are no additional moving fees, but you will be responsible for paying for your own transportation costs.

In terms of utilities and other expenses, you should budget for electricity, water, and gas expenses. These costs are typically paid monthly by the tenant and are billed directly by the utility companies. You should also factor in the cost of internet and phone services, as well as any other expenses that you may incur during your stay in Munich.

I hope this information is helpful, and I wish you a successful and enjoyable stay in Munich!

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
